![](images/icons/aptr.svg){fig-alt="Project logo: The letters A P T R above a green and blue line illustrating public transport stops along bus/metro lines." fig-align="center" width="70%"}

APT-R is a research project funded by the Research Council of Norway. 
The project's main focus is: 

1. Bayesian modelling of automatic passenger counts (APC) and automatic vehicle location data (AVL).
2. Developing an R-package with functions facilitating working with APC and AVL data.

*This website is under construction.*

The site is built using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) and hosted by [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/).
